attributes.action: allow alcohol to be drunk at football matches in sight of the pitch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time for football supporters to be treated as equals in society with supporters of other sports and those who attend other events.

The banning of the consumption of alcohol within sight of the pitch simply leads to those who wish to drink, drinking alcohol more quickly before a game rather than pacing themselves.

This can result in people getting drunk more quickly and lead to disorder problems.

The Government brought in 24 licensing in order to stop exactly the same problem in our towns and cities yet continues to keep this draconian law when it comes to football.

It is time that football supporters were given the same respect as other members of society.
